vsParam:
Sir!
Here is your bomb to crack the rock!

Oh, it's you! Heehee, it's good stuff.
I don't have to see that hateful rock anymore!

Sir, I got a suggestion. It does you no good to talk like that.
You'd better drop that tone.

Is that so!? I want to fit into this place.
I've been practicing to correct my accent...

Yeah... Ahem. Anyway, this bomb could crack any rock
as long as it's not especially giant.
Be careful when you fire it!

Haha, I know that, for sure!
I can't get hurt even for my family!

Uh, it'll blast anything to ashes!?
Isn't it way too powerful...

Haha, don't worry! I just need to pay more attention.
I can't get hurt even for my family!
Be careful when you fire it!

Haha, I know that, for sure!
I can't get hurt even for my family!

Uh, it'll blast anything to ashes!?
Isn't it way too powerful...

Haha, don't worry! I just need to pay more attention.
I can't get hurt even for my family!

Heehee, I hope you'll find a profitable lode.
Keep trying, sir!

Yes! I have no relatives after I came to Ateria, so I'm
beyond lonely... I'm so lucky to have met you nice people.

I'm going to use this bomb to make the biggest firework
ever! Haha! Just be patient, hahaha!

No, I don't think you can make fireworks...
Forget it. Let it be...
